subject: I want to use this opportuni
body:
I want to use this opportunity to inform you that the Commission is
paying the sum of TWENTY SEVEN MILLION, NINE HUNDRED AND SIXTY
THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS (USD27,960,000) to individuals who are
yet to receive their fund.
KINDLY CONTACT ME FOR MY EMAIL ( 
denismiller615@gmail.com
 )
Get back to me for more details and better understanding .
Best Regards,
Denis Miller.

subject: Re:   I want to use this opportuni
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I'm interested in learning more about how to claim the funds. Could you please provide me with further details on the process?

Best wishes,
Stanley

subject: Re: I want to use this opportuni
body:
Thanks for your response. Like I said earlier, I wanted to use this
opportunity to let you know that the United Nations Compensation Commission
following the conclusion of claims processing, the Commission awarded $69.9
Trillion to approximately 2.5 million successful claims from individuals,
corporations, governments and international organizations. With the final
payment of compensation made on December 27,  2023, all compensation
awarded by the Commission has now been paid in full.

The Commission is paying the sum of TWENTY SEVEN MILLION, NINE HUNDRED AND
SIXTY THOUSAND UNITED STATES DOLLARS (USD27,960,000) to individuals who are
yet to receive their fund. The Panel of Commissioners reviewed and
evaluated the claims submitted by governments, international organizations,
companies, and individuals. This claim is for production and financial
losses as a result of damages caused by the COVID-19 PANDEMIC, overdue
contract payment, Lottery awards, Next-of-kin, etc.

Kindly get back to us and tell us where your payment falls in and also
indicate if you have received yours (i.e USD27,960,000) Twenty Seven
Million, Nine and Sixty thousand United States Dollars. Please indicate but
if you have received your fund, also indicate if you have not. Note, you
must stop all further communication/transactions with any Agents, Payment
Center, Diplomatic Agent, and Financial institution as discussed and
concluded in the United Nations Compensation Commission (UNCC) committee
summit/meeting. Therefore, if you have not received your fund respond to
this message with the following details;

1) Your Name:
2) Address:
3) Phone Number:

Get back to us as soon as possible so that we will articulate the way
forward.
Best Regards,

Denis Miller.

subject: Re: I want to use this opportuni
body:
Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about the United Nations Commission's actions regarding successful claims. Can you provide more details on how the process works for receiving the awarded funds? I'm curious to learn more about the evaluation of claims and how individuals are contacted for payment.

Best wishes,
Stanley
